CustomField.description: 2019-05-10 Why does this exist? I think it was used to put the year into Conga Templates, but that can be easily done with switches an controls. Verify that it's not being used in any templates and then delete this.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The year of today. Literally. If it's August 30th of 2049 this could say 2049.
CustomField.label: (Do Not Use) CongaCurrentYear
